product_overview: DuduFisio-AI is an integrated management system for physiotherapy clinics combining traditional clinical management features with Artificial Intelligence assistance to optimize patient care, clinical documentation, and operational management.
core_goals: Digitize and automate physiotherapy clinical processes
Enhance quality of clinical documentation through AI
Increase operational efficiency and patient satisfaction
key_features: Interactive Body Map system for marking and visualizing pain points on the human body
Comprehensive Appointment Scheduling system with daily, weekly, monthly, and list views, including conflict prevention and notifications
Complete Medical Records management with rich text SOAP editor, auto-save, versioning, and digital signature
AI Assistant providing automatic report generation, protocol suggestions, risk analysis, clinical inquiries, and economic insights
Extensive Exercise Library categorized by specialty with rich media and personalized prescription capabilities
Patient Portal with secure login, access to personal records, prescribed exercises, appointments, and communication with the clinic
Operational Dashboards and Reports featuring financial, clinical, and productivity analytics with export options
Financial Management including multiple payment integrations and delinquency control
Inventory Management with material categorization, stock alerts, and movement history
Task Management with priority, progress tracking, and notifications
user_flow_summary: Administrator logs in to manage clinic settings, users, finances, and view comprehensive reports
Physiotherapist accesses patient records, documents clinical notes using the SOAP editor, schedules appointments, and reviews AI-generated protocol suggestions
Intern views patient data and schedules without editing permissions for learning purposes
Patient logs into the portal to view their treatment history, prescribed exercises, and request appointments
Clinic staff use the dashboard to monitor operational metrics, patient progress, and manage financial transactions
validation_criteria: System must validate user registrations including email validation and role-based access control
Patient management must prevent duplicate records and validate critical personal data like CPF
Appointment scheduling must prevent overlapping conflicts and handle recurring appointments
Clinical documentation editor must support rich-text input with auto-save and version history functionalities
AI-generated reports and treatment suggestions must meet 95% accuracy as measured by domain experts
System interface must be fully responsive and load within 2 seconds on 3G connections
Security requirements including encrypted data storage, two-factor authentication, LGPD compliance, and audit logging must be implemented
System must support 100 concurrent users with 99.5% uptime reliability
Export and import functionalities must support PDF, Excel, and CSV formats with data integrity checks
